job_tasks.phrase: play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the core activities of software development and delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the development of innovative solutions
job_tasks.justification: Indicates involvement in creating new software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform
job_tasks.justification: Describes the act of building and integrating systems, specifically those that interface with AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Write production-grade product and platform code.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct instruction for writing code for production environments.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights responsibilities for technical design and code delivery, core software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: our very own Generative AI tool
job_tasks.justification: Mentions a 'Generative AI tool', implying work related to generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the development of an AI chatbot, which falls under software development involving AI.

job_tasks.phrase: empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase connects technical work to user benefit and product value, indicating an understanding of business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
job_tasks.justification: These attributes (scalable, reliable, secure) are key concerns in operations and deployment, relevant to MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.
Take responsibility for component technical designs

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes software development in Go and mentions interaction with AI platforms and chatbots. However, it lacks specific details about deep AI/GenAI modeling, fine-tuning, or MLOps beyond general requirements for scalability and security. The core focus remains on engineering Go applications.
